Success: This turn, you can move to Difficult Terrain squares of the chosen Terrain Type within 1 square of your current position as if they were normal terrain.
Failure: This turn, entering these squares costs 1 extra square of movement.
Augment:
+1: squares within 2 squares of your current position.
+2:  squares within 5 squares of your current position.
+1: ignore terrain damage from these squares this turn.
